content.text1: Being together looks a little different these days, but we're excited to spend Easter together online. Join us for our Good Friday and Easter Sunday livestreams as we explore the loneliness Jesus experienced in his death and how his life brings us all together.

Our Easter livestreams are happening at 10am on Good Friday (April 10) and Easter Sunday (April 12). We'll spend an hour hanging out online with live music, communion, scripture readings, and reflecting on the meaning of Jesus' death and life as we learn about the Easter story found in the Bible. We can't wait to see you online!
